section.title: PortGroup ruby
section.para: PortGroup ruby allows for efficient porting of ruby-based open source software.

section.title: ruby PortGroup Specific Variables
section.para: When the ruby PortGroup is declared within a Portfile, the following variables are provided during port install.

listitem.para: Path to the Ruby vendorlibdir directory (i.e., ${prefix}/lib/ruby/vendor_ruby/${ruby.version})
The name for the Ruby architecture-dependent directory name (i.e., i686-darwin8.10.1).
Path to the Ruby vendor archdir (i.e., ${ruby.lib}/${ruby.arch}).
